pci_app_onboarding_content1: Deploy your AI applications and models with high availability.
pci_app_onboarding_content2: Choose from a catalogue or deploy your own Docker images.
pci_app_onboarding_content3: Are you a data scientist or developer, looking to deploy an AI application or model in just a few minutes? Select from a catalogue of apps or import your own containerised application. OVHcloud manages its high-availability deployment, and its security. Get CPU or GPU resources, real-time tracking tools, and simple, pay-as-you-go pricing. You can then log in via the API, or via an HTTP web interface.
pci_app_guides_documentation_description: Find all the documentation for AI Deploy.
pci_app_guides_definition_description: Find out what an app is at OVHcloud.
pci_app_guides_start_description: Find out how to get your app up and running quickly in the OVHcloud Control Panel.
pci_app_guides_share_description: Learn how to share an app with other developers.
pci_app_guides_object_storage_access_tit: Access your data from your object storage
pci_app_guides_object_storage_access_des: Find out how to access your data from your app with object storage.
